DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate beta cell function , pharmacodynamics , pharmacokinetics , safety tolerability 4 week treatment 75mgBID 75mgQD HMS5552 .
DOC.brief_title: Beta Cell Function Related Pharmacodynamics HMS5552 T2DM Patients
DOC.criteria: Male female , age 1865 year Has type 2 diabetes mellitus BMI 20 29kg/m2 Willingness adhere protocol requirement Patients type1 diabetes mellitus Received antidiabetic drug within runin screen Hepatic disease Kidney diseases Clinical abnormal find EVG , labs physical exam Women childbearing potential
